content: praarambham
(palliyil praveshicchu kurishu varacchu kondu thaazhepparayunna praarththanayum oru kaumaayum cholliyashesham namaskaaratthil sambandhikkunna)
bahumathipoorvvam ninte bhavanatthilekku njaan vannu ente nercchakal ninakku kazhikkum.
oru kaumaa

items.content: (shushrooshakkaaran madbahaayil praveshikkumpol)
dyvatthinte balipeedtatthinkalekkum ente pythal prakruthatthe santhoshippikkunna dyvatthinte atukkalekku njaan pokum.
(thronosinte mumpil chennu vanangikkondu)
dyvame ninre bhavanatthilekku njaan praveshicchu - svarggasthanaaya raajaave ninre simhaasanatthinu munpaake njaan panangi njaan cheythittulla sakala paapangalum ennotu kshamikkaname.
(thronosu chutti mutthumpol)

kartthaave, ninte balipeedtatthinte konukal vare changalakalaal  njangalute perunaalukale bandhikkaname - nee ente dyvamaakunnu; ninakku njaan sthothram cheyyum - nee ente dyvamaakunnu; ninne njaan sthuthikkum.
(mezhukuthiri katthikkumpol. Vatakku vashatthe mezhukuthiri)
velivuniranjorisho...
(thekku vashatthe mezhukuthiri)
velivinthattil...
(shushrooshakkuppaayam dharikkumpol)
dyvamaaya kartthaave, vishuddha roohaayute shakthiyaal naashamillaattha

anki enne dharippikkaname - pithaavum, puthranum, vishuddha ruhaayume!- njangalute aayushkaalam muzhuvanum - sathyavishvaasatthil vetippum chovvumulla natapatikalil natatthappetuvaan - njangalkku samgathiyaakkaname. Aammeen.
(ooraaraa dharikkumpol)
yuddhatthil shakthikondu enne ara kettikkukayum - enikku virodhamaayi nilkkunnavare - ente keezhil muttu matakkikkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Aammeen.
(pattakkaaran kurbbaanaykkaayi madbahaayute natayil kayari patinjaarottu thirinju kymalartthippiticchu “shubkkono” chodikkumpol)
janam:- kartthaavu angayute praarththana kelkkukayum - baliyil thirumanasaakukayum - kurbbaana sveekarikkukayum - angayotukoote njangaleyum sambandhippikkukayum cheyyumaaraakatte.

content: (koorbbaanaykku mumpu pazhayaniyamam vaayikkuvaan thutangumpol)
“neethimaanmaarute kootaaratthil - mahathvatthinteyum rakshayuteyum shabdam” ennu daaveedu mukhaanthiram parishuddha roohaa - paati.
(madbahaayute thaazhe namaskkaarameshayute vatakke attam chernnu ninnukondu)
vaayanakkaaran:- orytthaayute onnaam pusthakatthil ninnum - baarekmor.
janam:- srushtikalute utayavanu sthuthiyum - nammute mel thante anugrahangalum - ennekkumundaayirikkatte.
(kurbaanaykkaayi thirasheela neekkunnathinu mumpu)
(bnuharoku hosenaan enna mattil)

kartthaave! Praarththana kettarul - haaleluyyaa
1. Kykkollanamaharonanacchathupole - dhuoopamithum
kandatiyaar shushrooshaye ninuvayarin - yaachana pol
/tkatalathil younaane - nnapo - le
/tkaniyuka daasanmaa - rilennum.

Kartthaave nilavili kettarul - haale - luyyaa
2. Theeruka thirunaamatthinu sukhakaramaa - yeedhupam
thrukkaralinnalivinnanukoolamathaam-moolavumaayu
/tnirappaakaname dy-vame-nin
/tnirupamakrupayaal nja-ngalo-tu.

3. Ennum sthuthininkanivinu kaniverum-rakshakane
ethra niranjinnengum kaanunnoo - nindaanam
/tninuvayarotundaa -yako-pam
/tnilaviliyaal nee nee - kkiya - llo.

4. Aharonteyumaa skkariyaa thannuteyum-dhoopamathum
maranatthe neekkiya phinahaasin praar - ththanayum pol
/tatiyaarute dhoopa -tthe-yum
/tanputayone ky -kko - lka.

5. Erithee nira vitteere doothanira-ngicchennu
ithamotu mariyaam gruhamathil nasretthil cholliyithu
/tninnotukoote ka-rtthaa-vee
/tmannitamakhilam paalippon.”

6. Mulmarameriyaatheritheethan natuvil - kandathupol
chinmayanammariyaammilvasicchu sharee-ram poondu
/tathinaal bhamgavuma-kka-nyaa
/tvrathamudraykkundaa-yi-lla.

7. Lokam thaathasahodarar jaathiyathum-tharavaatum
aakeyupekshiccheshuvinaayu maranam-snehiccha
/tsahadenmaare sadaa-kaa-lam
/tsmaranam cheyvathu - nannettam.

8. Thookkappettumaratthil vilaavuthura-nnaacchavalam
raktham vellamotozhukum mashihaaye - sahadenmaar,
/tkandangoti mari-ppaa-naayu
/tkartthaavin per-kkellaarum.
anuthaapam

9. Velivuniranjoreeshoninvelivaal kaanunnu
veliveeyatiyaarakhilaadhaaramathaam - velivum nee
/tkaanthyaa njangale nee - thaathan
/tkathire! Shobhippi-kke-nnum.

10. Velivinthattil vasikkum punyanidhe! - parishuddha!
Vendaakkashtatha veenchinthayumatiyaa-reennozhikka
/tsalkriyakalkku manashu-ddhyaa
/tsamgathi varane nja-ngalkku.

11. Haabelin kunjaatum nohinute-kaazhchayathum
abrahaamthan baliyum kykkonda-kartthaave,
/tnompum praarththanayum-ky-kko-
/tndanpaalatiyaare-kaa-kkuka.

12. Mochanamathinaayu paapikale! Varuvin-yaachippin
muttunnorkku thurannitume naathan-than vaathil
/tyaachikkunnon praa-pikkum
/tanveshippon kykkollum.
parethar

13. Kartthaave! Ninrakthashareerangal-kykkondu
bhaktharathaayi maricchorkkarulaname-nallormma
/tninte mahathvamudi-kkum-naal
/tnilkkanamavar valabhaa-ga-tthil.
(suriyaaniyil)

bedu mor dukharono thobo laneede mhymane
dekhaal phagaroku kaadeesho veshthee dmokku haayo
/tvankumun men yaameenoku
/tbyaumo ddhanho raabooso

items.content:
1. Praathakaalatthil-dhoopam vaykkumpol
doothanmaar vaanil-sthothram paatunnu.
Paapam poondorkkaay-mochippin dhoopam
pattakkaareesha-arppiccheetunnu.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
naathaa yaachippin-saaphalyam nalka.

2. Kaalatthe aharon-kartthrupreethikkaayu
dhoopatthotaarnnaan-samshuddhasthaanam
saurabhyam kykkondeeshan modicchu
dvesham poondore-kaatthaan nirbbaadham.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa devaa!
Ninnanpaal-krodham neekkenam.

3. Oottunkal chennu-neerinnarththicchu
shramaayasthreeye-veendone sthothram!
Neerangarththicchu-sthree thannillethum
divyam paaneeyam-nee daanam cheythu
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
nin raktham moolam-lokam nee veendu.

4. Nin perkkarppiccho-ree dhoopam shuddham
aharontethoppam-nin preethikkaaka
dvesham poondaarthan-naasham theertthone
thval kaarunyatthaal-krodham neekkenam.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
devaagaare nin shyno vaazhatte.
dyvamaathaavu

4. Nin perkkarppiccho-ree dhoopam shuddham
aharontethoppam-nin preethikkaaka
dvesham poondaarthan-naasham theertthone
thval kaarunyatthaal-krodham neekkenam.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
devaagaare nin shyno vaazhatte.

5. Dhanye! Maathaave-ninnotullanpaal
paapatthin bhaaram-naathan neekkatte
nyaayattheerppinkal-paayikkaathamme
praarththikkenam nee-nin puthran mumpil.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
nin yaachippennum-njangalkkaalambam.

6. Seenaayu shylatthil-mooshaa darshiccha
mulkkoottam kanye!-nin chithram thanne
maathaave! Mullaay-kandaan nin deham
thee theendaanjora-ppathram kanyaathvam.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
antharbhaagaagni-garbhasthan dyvam.

7. Kanyaamegham bhoo-lokeshan thanne
evvannam poonde-nnennotothaname
maalaakhaamumpan-grabreeyel chonnaan
lokeshan naathan-vaazhvoo ninnullil
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa thaan
thanne sathyam - vishvatthe veendon.

8 vaazhvinnaakatte-maathaavinnormma
maaddhuyastham nammal-kkennaalum kotta
thannil ninnallo-shleehanmaar naathan
lokam rakshippaan-samjaatham cheythu.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
thaanthanne sathyam-vishvatthe veendaan.
parishuddhanmaar

9. Thannullam kyyil-pallikkullil nal
peedtam nirmmicchon-mashihaaye, sthothram.
Nibiyar shleehanmaar-sahader siddhanmaar
ennee nikshepam-sookshicchaanullil.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
ee divyaagaaram- sthaapicchon dhanyan.

10. Kaattil paarunnor-aaraanennevam
veeranmaarekka-ndeshaayaa chonnu
sammaanaarhanmaar-sahadenmaar siddhar
shleehar nibiyanmaa-rathre salsamgham.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
bhooshaadaathaave! - kaarunyam cheyka.

11. Ennotothenam-sahadenmaare! Kel
enthortthikkashtappaatellaamettu
aa bhaagyam nethram-darshicchittilla,
kettittille, kaa-thullaarnnittilla.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
bhakthanmaarkkeeshan-nalkeetum sthaanam.

12. Saurabhyam pole theekkundil pettu
snehatthin gandham-vyaapippicchore!
Ningalthannasthi-maanicchittulla
pallikkul kshemam-varddhippaanaayi
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
kartthaavin pakkal-praarththiccheetenam.
ekaparishuddhan

13. (maartthommaa) shleehaa! Ninne ormmiccho-
raattinkoottatthe kartthan kaakkunnu
kandaalum ninne kondaatum koottam
ninne nandikkum - mashihaaye vaazhtthum
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
nin yaachippennum sankethasthaanam.

14. (maartthommaa) siddhaa!-aartthanmaarellaam
thvalpaadam pooki-thadvaakyam kelkka
saatthaanaakarshi-cchennorkkaashvaa
sam rogikkaalambam-nalkenam naathaa
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
nin yaachippennum sankethasthaanam.
prabhaatham

15. Vettam veenappol daaveedaamodaal
devaagaaratthil praarththippaan poyi
lokam veendone!- naathaa en vaakyam
dhyaanam kanneere-nniva kykkollane.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
nee nalkeetenam paapatthin shaanthi.

16.Kshipram maayunno-ree mayyalkkaalam
vishvatthe evam-shobhippicchenkil
paathaalasthanmaar-uththaanam cheyke
kartthaavitthum-naalettam shreshdtam
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
bhooshaadaathaave! Kaarunyam cheyka.
anuthaapam

17. Paapam cheyyaayvin-vaathukkal neethi
peretum peri-kaaval nilkkunnu
than kyppenaayaal-cherkkumgranthatthil
martthuyanmaar kruthyam- haa! Nirddhaakshinyam!
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
sarvvaanthavedee-kaarunyam cheyka.

18. Thannatthaan paapam-cheythen kezhunnen
tholppicchaan saatthaan njaan kuttakkaaran
kashtam njaan doshi- haa kashtam dhrushtan
nyaayattheerppin naa-layyayyo! Kashtam.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
kartthaave! Annaal-kaarunyam cheyka.

19. Kartthaave! Njangal-vaathil muttunnu
neeyallo nalku-nnellaamellaarkkum
chodicchaal kittum-thetumpol kaanum
muttumpol vaathil-bandham neengunnu.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
vaathil kezhunnor-kkekunnon dhanyan.

20. Dyvatthin vaathil-kaarunyaasthaanam
muttikkezhumpol-aashvaasam nalkum
dushtasthree choran- chunkakkaaran than
kanneer vaartthappol-paapam maayicchu.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa naathaa!
Njangalkkum-nalkenam-mukthi.
parethar
21. Vishvaasatthaale-vaangippoyore
praarththiccheetumpol-orttheetenam naam
aashvaasam nithyam-praapiccheetaanaayu
thronosinmel pe-rorttheetenam naam.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
jeevippikkunnon-naathaa! Sthothram the!
